    Storyboard Script Library

    A library of 3 scripts for use with Storybrew

    Contribute

    Recent Releases

    EZ Lyrics

    Text
    Configurable

    Very esay to use Lyrics script. Plug and play, configure inside Storybrew. Requires a timed .ass file

    BG Parallax

    Background
    Script

    Moves the background in the opposite direction of player cursor. As seen in Chata - enn.

    Falling Leaves

    Particles
    Script

    Falling leaves effect with per object rotation.
